QuestData.Title: Restoring Balance
QuestData.Description:
Ardenweald is crucial to the cycle of rebirth for nature spirits that enter their realm.
Unfortunately, the anima drought has led to the loss of entire groves--souls that will never complete their cycle.
Now foes seek to destroy what remains of the once tranquil forests, threatening the already beleaguered Court of Night.
Lady Moonberry of the Court has requested aid. Pathscribe Roh-Avonavi in the Ring of Transference above can provide transport.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lady Moonberry at the Heart of the Forest in Ardenweald.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lady Moonberry at the Heart of the Forest in Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome! What brings you to the Heart of the Forest?
